website_summaries.verdict: A reasonably priced mask with bonus blackhead removing tools. Not only is it a good value but it also earns top marks for being highly effective.
pros: In addition to doing a good job at removing most blackheads and helping clear up skin blemishes, it earns praise for leaving skin feeling smooth and tight

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Why are the product reviews so good? I've used this product 4 times already and it doesn't pick up any black heads. I'm really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its up yo you.
customer_reviews.text: Ok so reviews I read said it don't hurt . Shoots it hurt like ah itch. It really cleans your face it feels good. As for the black head and all that stuff not sure. It hurts coming off really hurts it pulls all the fine hair on my face. Especially around my mouth. But I like it if you can take the pain go ahead not that you should have too. I have really oily skin .
customer_reviews.author: Claudia.

customer_reviews.title: I do have to say it does remove dead skin very well and some blackheads and if you like a smooth hairless face it's great
customer_reviews.text: If you've ever seen those FaceBook videos of people painfully pulling off their face mask. This is it. DO NOT GET IT STUCK ON YOUR EYEBROWS! I do have to say it does remove dead skin very well and some blackheads and if you like a smooth hairless face it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Hundley

customer_reviews.title: Messes up with your skin!
customer_reviews.text: I thought that this product will clean up my pores and hopefully a couple of blackheads, but nooo! It totally messed up with my skin since I literally had to scratch it from my face (although I did not put it on for a long time) !! I got tens of pimples after I took this mask off and it took me a month to recover from those. I definitely do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sevgi Gokce Kafali

customer_reviews.title: Fun tools, bad mask
customer_reviews.text: I like the tools that come with this product. However the mask does not help remove poor buildup and hurts when you remove it. I didn't even wait for the full time it said to have it dry and it still was a pain to pull off and left my skin red.
customer_reviews.author: Nora Arnold

customer_reviews.title: It was horrible! I purchased this believing that it was the ...
customer_reviews.text: It was horrible! I purchased this believing that it was the right product that I’ve always wanted to try out. The peel off mask that will take the blackheads out of my pores! But this one doesn’t even take out anything other than my facial fuzz that’s it! I’m utterly disappointed! Not to mention the blisters it left on my nose and scans on my cheeks. It’s a bad cheap product. Don’t buy it!
customer_reviews.author: QT Beloved

customer_reviews.title: Teenage dream
customer_reviews.text: Teenage daughter loves this. Of course it's all over Instagram, duh. It works!
customer_reviews.author: Kami

customer_reviews.title: this doesn't work to save your life. it pulls ...
customer_reviews.text: this doesn't work to save your life. it pulls your skin and makes your eyes water but does absolutely nothing for your pores except clog them more.
customer_reviews.author: corielovee

customer_reviews.title: It is PAINFUL to remove
customer_reviews.text: Three of us used this - 52yo woman, 21 yo male, 17 yo female. All with different types of skin. It is PAINFUL to remove. The 2 girls finally used damp paper towels to scrub it off, and I'm not sure if any blemishes came with it. The male said it also hurt, but was able to get it off and also isn't sure if it did anything. We were excited to try a charcoal mask and won't try again. disppointed.
customer_reviews.author: JDW

customer_reviews.title: Powerful peel
customer_reviews.text: This mask is refreshing. I love how clean and smooth your skin is afterwards. Not only does it take off the dead skin and clear pores but it helps get all those little fine hairs that you can’t see.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t peel off
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t even peel it off my face. Idk if I did something wrong? But I couldn’t grab any part of it to peel it off. I had to just wash it off.
customer_reviews.author: ericka

customer_reviews.title: Not that good
customer_reviews.text: Have to use half the tube to do the nose and cheeks.
customer_reviews.author: Nolan Leupp

customer_reviews.title: This the best charcoal face mask I've used
customer_reviews.text: This the best charcoal face mask I've used. I like this product. this one is my favorite. My face is so soft and clear. Pulled out little things that my other ones missed.
customer_reviews.author: Liang

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty good. Hurts somewhat peeling it off though
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty good. Hurts somewhat peeling it off though. Sometimes thats the price of beauty. If you apply it a little thicker doesn't hurt so bad peeling off.
customer_reviews.author: Michele DiRugeris

customer_reviews.title: its great for removing hairs and dead skin on your face ...
customer_reviews.text: its great for removing hairs and dead skin on your face but doesn't seem to pull out my blackheads but I assume the reason is because I have very small pores,the tools on the other head work nice!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great around the nose area
customer_reviews.text: Works great around the nose area, just be careful you don't get this product in your eyebrow area, it will pull them out!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer F.

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: It really does pull the nasty thingd out of your pores
customer_reviews.author: Larissa

customer_reviews.title: Gave me a rash
customer_reviews.text: At first it was good, however the next day I now have a lot of little red spots where I put the peel on! :(
customer_reviews.author: Emilie Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: Pulled only a few blackheads out.. mainly pulled the little hairs on my face out.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Didn't help my blackheads and also made me break out badly a day after use.
customer_reviews.author: JOANNA J. Routhowski

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work and the 5 star reviews are fake
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product unless you would like to get scammed doesn't work reviews are fake
customer_reviews.author: Isaiah

customer_reviews.title: Does not come with any instructions...nothing spectacular to report
customer_reviews.text: Not real impressed actually. The tool came with no instructions at all. So I tried to find out how to use it on the web. For the most part, I have not been able to get it to do anything for me. Maybe they are meant for someone with a more serious case of acne. Not sure. I just was trying to make my pores look smaller and hopefully avoid the occasional blemish. The mask is ok, but it does not feel good on at all. Very drying and rubbery feel to it. I took a shot, but it really isn't right for my skin. But it could certainly be for someone els. Price was right
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic69

customer_reviews.title: Nice mask, weird product info
customer_reviews.text: I like the mask. It wasn't hard to pull off and my face felt refreshed afterwards. I will say, however the "Use Manual" has the weirdest description I've every read. Clearly this is not made in America. At least they got the directions correctly, lol.
customer_reviews.author: BuyerA

customer_reviews.title: buyer beware - warning warning warning
customer_reviews.text: So 1k plus reviews are 5 stars? seriously? serial? so serial? I am guessing after 50 minutes with this garbage on my face, that it will not be drying ever. So gross, so mad. China, you, youuuuuuuuu. well played scammer. God knows what is in the mask. Gutter oil perchapS? fURIOUS
customer_reviews.author: Ariele

customer_reviews.title: Not good at all
customer_reviews.text: Not good at all... It leaves your skin feeling smooth because it pulls on all the hair you have on your face. The strips from Biore do a much better job... Plus it stinks of bad chemicals... I wish this could work, but it did not :( ANd yes, I used it after the shower when my pores are open (the same way I use the pore strips). Wish I could return it.
customer_reviews.author: jamile

customer_reviews.title: Not worth a penny
customer_reviews.text: Poor product. Did not work at all. I used it in myself and I have excellent skin care d/t products I use. I used it on my 11 & 12 yr old boys and it did nothing, removed not one black head. Horrible!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shayne K.

customer_reviews.title: Love this mask and the little tools it came with
customer_reviews.text: Love this mask and the little tools it came with. Didn't even realize this till I got the package in the mail. The mask works great, just be sure to allow plenty of time to remove it. I didn't think it would take SO long to get it all off my face.
customer_reviews.author: hswigart

customer_reviews.title: alright
customer_reviews.text: not as strong as I thought it would be, but certainly does help pulling off dead skin and blackheads on the surface. maybe I just need to add a thicker layer ?
customer_reviews.author: Harley

customer_reviews.title: Read
customer_reviews.text: I have struggled with acne since a young teenager and now all I struggle with are black heads. This product doesn't get many sometimes it doesn't get any black heads at all. It does leave your face feeling amazing and fresh but doesn't get any black heads.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Delgado

customer_reviews.title: LOVE! Works wonders
customer_reviews.text: One word!! LOVE! Works wonders! Really glad I made the buy
customer_reviews.author: 29asw

customer_reviews.title: Plesant
customer_reviews.text: This mask was very nice but i was looking for something that peeled off a little harder and really pull at my clogged pores.
customer_reviews.author: S.P.D.R.

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt pull black heads out
customer_reviews.text: Didn't really get the black heads out and I followed the instructions, i will say tools they give you are worth it and the tools cleaned it great
customer_reviews.author: Catlover88

customer_reviews.title: It was a thin latex like substance that just kinda sat there
customer_reviews.text: Meh. I had high hopes for this but it didn’t extract anything from my nose or face. It was a thin latex like substance that just kinda sat there, and peeled off really easily.
customer_reviews.author: jessi

customer_reviews.title: Ouch
customer_reviews.text: Hurt sooooooo bad but then I felt smooth af lol
customer_reviews.author: abbey

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't get rid of blackheads and is very painful to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap quality. It is very difficult to pull off. Much better on spending your money on a different way to clear blackheads.
customer_reviews.author: Haylie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This mask good and it's easy use and efficiency clear the blackheads.
customer_reviews.author: Dane Woody

customer_reviews.title: Eventually I found this product on Amazon. Just tried ...
customer_reviews.text: Eventually I found this product on Amazon. Just tried on my nose and it did help me remove the blackheads. Just a little reminder, don't spread too thick otherwise it would take long to get it fully dry.
customer_reviews.author: Babbar L.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I’m sure there’s better products but this is doing its job but terribly
customer_reviews.author: Michael

product_meta.title: Peel off Mask, Blackhead Remover Tool Kit, Black Mask, Premium Quality Blackhead Remover Mask Purifying Deep Cleansing Acne Resist Oily Skin Strawberry Nose Tearing Style Cleansing Mask
